( That's right, IR never got out of the chamber, she just woke up for a bit and then went back into repair mode. Just to clear things up.)

* Zyber looked up at Striker and wined, he was damaged and clearly in need of assistance. She looked back at Rowdy Wolf then back at Striker.*

" I believe you."

* She looked at his wounds and sighed, he was in much need of a repair chamber. She looked back at Rowdy.*

" We must help him, he is in need of a repair. I know that this would mean that he would be stationed in your home, the call is up to you...after all."
